backend/main.mo: Main actor defining deposit transactions with multi-currency support (9 African currencies), winning records, M-PESA paybill integration (400004), exchange rate conversion to KES, and admin/user role-based access control for deposit confirmation and payout operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new actor types to remove the userProfiles map while preserving transactions, winningRecords, and nextTransactionId state during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting removal of profile-related frontend components, routes, React Query hooks, phone validation utilities, and UI cards across multiple test requirements (REQ-36 through REQ-40).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including App.tsx (admin-only routing), profile components (header, tabs, sections), deposit interface with M-PESA paybill 400004, phone verification for 16 African countries, and React Query hooks for deposit/admin operations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining Betika green theme colors and comprehensive design tokens for light and dark modes including sidebar, chart, and UI component variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Betika Casino application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router configuration defining root, index, and admin routes all rendering AdminPage component with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying a lock icon, restricted access message, and Internet Identity login button with loading state for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AdminFundsReleas: Admin component displaying pending winner payouts with user details, amounts in KES, win dates, and confirmation dialog for releasing winnings with success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/DataTable.tsx: A reusable table component that renders data in a table format with configurable columns, supporting custom formatting and displaying a message when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/DepositSection.t: Handles deposit initiation with multi-currency support, calculates exchange rates to KES, displays M-PESA payment instructions (Paybill 400004, Account 0116828013), and manages deposit confirmation flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token from URL params, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient configuration with delegation identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for deposit operations (initiate/confirm), admin fund release management (pending winners, release history), and admin role verification using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including Betika green brand colors and utility classes for styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that verifies admin access, displays fund release management interface with summary cards (holding account, pending payouts, total released), and shows release history in a data table.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space (including Betika green branding), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for a Betika-like betting and casino app, listing implemented features including user profiles, authentication, phone verification, payment deposits, and architectural notes about multi-currency support and M-PESA integration.
